pr_title: Display custom inbound authenticators in management console.

timeline.bodyText: we can use CollectionUtils.isNotEmpty(customInboundAuthenticatorConfigs) && CollectionUtils.isNotEmpty(inboundAuthenticationRequestConfigs) here and remove nested if
timeline.author: emswbandara

replies.bodyText: If we remove the nested if condition and use a &&, we have to do the CollectionUtils.isNotEmpty(customInboundAuthenticatorConfigs)  check twice.
replies.author: mevan-karu

replies.bodyText: where do we check CollectionUtils.isNotEmpty(customInboundAuthenticatorConfigs)  for the second time? we can remove the second check
replies.author: emswbandara

replies.bodyText: If we remove the nested if, we have to check twice.
replies.author: mevan-karu
